root.para: The required disclosures related to fair value are extensive and detailed. FASB ASC 820-10-50 provides details of the information that should be disclosed by the reporting entity. FASB ASC 820-10-50 also provides information on other required disclosures related to fair value. Paragraphs 99â€“107 of FASB ASC 820-10-55 provide illustrative disclosures about fair value measurements.
